name: Empty States Kit (7 free templates!)
description:
Create gorgeous and engaging empty state screens for your UI with this free Figma kit! All screens feature Blush illustrations!


The empty states you'll find inside:

  • No flights found
  • 404 error
  • Empty inbox
  • No internet
  • No tasks left
  • New bank account
  • No files uploaded


Edit the illustrations!

All the illustrations in this project were made with Blush, which means that you can customize them however you want using the Blush plugin!


Get the plugin

To get the best out of this collection, install the Blush plugin and edit all the doodles.
